p: It has been reported that the number of inflammatory joints and the extent of morning stiffness are improved by TQ. In a placebo-controlled study of 40 females with rheumatoid arthritis treated with N. sativa, TQ showed protective results against rheumatoid arthritis, and a decrease in arthritis scoring (disease activity score (DAS-28) and bone resorption were reported ( Hadi et al., 2016).
